pkgmetadata.longdescription: Client for 'mapshaper' for 'Geospatial' Operations // Edit and simplify 'geojson', 'Spatial', and 'sf' objects. This is wrapper around the 'mapshaper' 'JavaScript' library by Matthew Bloch https://github.com/mbloch/mapshaper/ to perform topologically-aware polygon simplification, as well as other operations such as clipping, erasing, dissolving, and converting 'multi-part' to 'single-part' geometries.
